services.title: Services
services.subtitle: We offer a full range of solutions to ensure successful events. With a focus on excellence and customization, our services include high-quality equipment rental, full logistics management and specialized technical support. We are ready to transform any event, from small to large, with cutting-edge technology and all the necessary infrastructure to provide an unforgettable experience.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Start Audio Visual was founded in 2001, initially as a family business with the goal of offering high-quality audiovisual solutions. Over time, the company has undergone a process of evolution, structuring itself in a solid manner to serve an increasingly demanding market. Over the years, Start Audio Visual has stood out for its innovation, quality and commitment to excellence, expanding its services and gaining a loyal customer base. Today, the company is recognized in the industry for its ability to deliver complete projects, from equipment rental to high-level audiovisual productions. With a specialized team and modern infrastructure, Start Audio Visual continues to reinvent itself, maintaining its family essence and its commitment to quality and trust.
